string:
BZZRT! BZZRT! BZZRT!
You wake up with a groan, your alarm clock sitting on the nightstand near your bed.
It reads 6am.
What do you do?
choices: Hit the snooze button a few times
Force yourself to get up bright and early.

string:
You hit the snooze button and roll back over, drifting back to sleep.
You rinse and repeat this routine about 16 times before you realize...
choices: Shit! That you're late for training!
That it's time for more sleep

string:
You pull back the bed sheets and stand up.
You look at the alarm clock and see that it's only 10am.
Might as well eat some breakfast.
choices: Eat a hardy and meal and then make your way to the gym

string:
As much as you'd rather not be up yet, you need to get to the gym.
You are, after all, a professional wrestler.
choices: Eat a hardy and meal and then make your way to the gym

string:
Oh crap, you missed your morning workout!
There's no time for breakfast!
Or is there...?
choices: Skip breakfast and then make your way to the gym
Eat a quick meal and then make your way to the gym

string:
Screw it, you were partying hard last night.
You won't be able to train very well this morning anyway.
You sleep in a bit longer before finally getting up.
choices: Skip breakfast and then make your way to the gym

string: You arrive at the gym well fed and on time.
You arrive at the gym well fed but late.
You arrive at the gym late, and you're still hungry to boot.
You arrive at the gym well fed but embarrassingly late.
You arrive at the gym embarrassingly late, and you're still hungry to boot.
